newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary Matav redeems 168 mln Ecu state guarantee.
newsitem.headline: Hungary Matav redeems 168 mln Ecu state guarantee.

text.p: Hungarian telecommunications company Matav Rt signed an agreement on Thursday with an international bank consortium led by ABN-AMRO Bank on the issue of a five-year bank guarantee worth 168 million Ecus.
The bank guarantee will replace the state guarantee for the investment loans granted by the Luxembourg-based European Investment Bank (IEB) in 1990 and in 1994.

"This is the first time in this region that we have released a state guarantee and replaced it with a commercial guarantee," Chris Knowles, head of lending operations in central and eastern Europe at IEB told a news conference.
